members.name: Iggy Pop, Artist
members.quote: The friendship was basically that this guy salvaged me from certain professional and maybe personal annihilation â€” simple as that.

members.name: Brian Eno, Artist
members.quote: Some people say Bowie is all surface style and second-hand ideas, but that sounds like a definition of pop to me.

members.name: Tony Visconti, Music Producer
members.quote: We are fortunate to have lived in the same time as him.
